entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 4:30PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: A warm front will lift northward across the Gulf coast and Copper River Basin on Saturday. A wintry mix is likely, particularly during the morning hours. Trace ice accumulations are possible, leading to potentially hazardous travel conditions along the Richardson Highway between Glennallen and Valdez.
